label: 注進
対訳語: Listing up the details and submitting them to the authorities.  It can also mean to submit a report.
説明文: In the context of Hyōhanki (Hōgen 1 uru 9th month 18th day) chūshin means to list up and submit, however it can also mean to report unusual acts to the authorities, or simply to report major occurences or events. [兵範記、保元]
